alert.note: Alert for Ford; Iroquois (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 4:36PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Ford and far southwestern Iroquois Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 435 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Paxton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Paxton, Loda and Clarence. Including the following interstate... I-57 between mile markers 258 and 266. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
